definition.text: Verify that the Data Storage nodes for the corresponding Market were created successfully.

translations.text: Verifica que los nodo Data Storage para el Market correspondiente se crearon con éxito.
Überprüfen Sie, ob die Datenspeicherknoten für den entsprechenden Market erfolgreich erstellt wurden.
İlgili Borsa ( Market ) için Veri Depolama ( Data Storage ) düğümlerinin başarıyla oluşturulduğunu doğrulayın.
Убедитесь, что узлы Data Storage для соответствующего Market были успешно созданы.

paragraphs.text: Look for the following data structures:

translations.text: Busque las siguientes estructuras de datos:
Suchen Sie nach den folgenden Datenstrukturen:

paragraphs.text: A Market Data Products node under Data Mines Data, with a Data Mine Products node for each Data Mine in the workspace.

translations.text: Un nodo Market Data Products  bajo Data Mines Data, con un nodo Data Mine Products para cada Data Mine en el espacio de trabajo.
Ein Knoten Market Data Products unter Data Mines Data, mit einem Knoten Data Mine Products  für jede Data Mine  im Arbeitsbereich.

Çalışma alanındaki her Veri Madeni ( Data mine ) için bir Veri Madeni Ürünleri ( Data mine Products ) düğümü ile Veri Madeni Verileri ( Data Mines Data ) altındaki bir Borsa Veri Ürünleri ( Market Data Products )  düğümü.
Узел Market Data Products в разделе Data Mines Data, с узлом Data Mine Products для каждого Data Mine в рабочем пространстве.

paragraphs.text: A Market Trading Products node under Trading Mines Data, with a Trading Session Reference for each trading session in the testing and production environments.

translations.text: Un nodo Market Trading Products bajo Trading Mines Data, con un Trading Session Reference para cada sesión de trading en los entornos de prueba y producción.
Ein Knoten Market Trading Products unter Trading Mines Data, mit einer Trading Session Reference für jede Handelssitzung in den Test- und Produktionsumgebungen.

Test ve üretim ortamlarındaki her bir ticaret oturumu için bir Ticaret Oturumu Referansı ( Trading Session Reference ) ile Ticaret Maden Verileri ( Trading Mines Data ) altındaki bir Borsa Ticaret Ürünleri ( Market Trading Products ) düğümü.
Узел Market Trading Products в разделе Trading Mines Data с ссылкой на торговую сессию для каждой торговой сессии в тестовых и производственных окружениях.
